passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(6) > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > form > h5:nth-child(3)

any.message: Heading order valid
